item.title: Boomerang - Redundancy Improves Latency and Throughput in Payment-Channel Network
item.description: https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1230936389300080640 Introduction Redundancy can be a useful tool for speeding up payment channel networks and improving throughput. We presented last week at Financial Crypto. You just received a nice introduction to payment channels and payment channel networks. Payment channels Alice and Bob are connected through a payment channel. This is a channel and in that channel there are some coins that are escrowed. Some coins belong to Alice some belong to Bob and they want to transact them back and forth.
